gpu: X.Org Radeon RX Vega (VEGA10, DRM 3.23.0, 4.15.0-33-generic, LLVM 8.0.0)
notes: Launcher works but the game itself won't start. Tried 32bit and 64bit version, different proton launch options and without Steam overlay.
title: Blue Estate The Game

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX Vega (VEGA10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.9-arch1-1-ARCH, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: The game runs completely fine without any issues, the performance could be better but it's perfectly playable (It drops below 60 quite often on a Vega 64). The game is known for supporting a huge amount of input devices but I only tested mouse and keyboard, I did not test leap motion nor the light gun since I don't own any such devices.
title: Blue Estate The Game
